definitions.definition: a weapon with a long shaft and a pointed tip, typically of metal, used for thrusting or throwing.
examples: javelin, lance, assegai, harpoon, bayonet; Moregaff, leister; historicalpike "a hand-carved ceremonial spear"Moregaff, leister; pike a hand-carved ceremonial spear

definitions.definition: an instrument with a long shaft and barbed tip used for catching fish.
a plant shoot, especially a pointed stem of asparagus or broccoli.
pierce or strike with a spear or other pointed object.
examples: she speared her last French fry with her fork

definitions.definition: quickly extend the arm to catch (a fast-moving ball or other object).
examples: he hit a line drive that Bogar speared backhanded
